func.title: SetSolidMask

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of the top left corner of the new SolidMask rectangle within the definition's SolidMask.png image.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of the top left corner of the new SolidMask rectangle within the definition's SolidMask.png image.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the new SolidMask rectangle within the definition's SolidMask.png image.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the new SolidMask rectangle within the definition's SolidMask.png image.

param.name: target_x
param.desc: X target position of the SolidMask relative to the top left corner of the object graphic.

param.name: target_y
param.desc: Y target position of the SolidMask relative to the top left corner of the object graphic.

func.desc: Sets the solid area of an object. The source rectangle determines which pixels from the definition's SolidMask.png graphic should be used. All pixels within the rectangle of less than 50% transparency will be solid. Also see the SolidMask entry in DefCore.txt.
func.remark: Solid areas will internally be drawn in the landscape using the "Vehicle" material.

example.text: Removes the SolidMask for the calling object.
